info.name: nuvolo-development
info.description: API documentation for e-commerce web application "nuvolo".

item.name: auth
item.description: This folder contains API requests and logic related to user authentication and authorization. It includes endpoints for user login, registration, password reset, token generation, and validation.

item.name: admin
item.description: This folder handles API requests that are specific to administrative tasks and functionalities. It includes endpoints for managing users, system settings, monitoring, and other privileged operations that require admin-level access.

item.description: This folder is responsible for API requests related to product management. It includes endpoints for creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving product information, as well as managing product-related data such as inventory, pricing, and descriptions.

item.name: category
item.description: This folder contains API requests for managing product categories. It includes endpoints for creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving category information, organizing products into categories, and handling category-specific queries.
